WorkItem.Description:
The memory leak happens with the following scenario and confirmed with CLRprofiler:
Â 
The datagrid bound to the observable collection. Some worker thread every 2 seconds clears all rows of the observable collection and adds 2000 rows again.
When the window is closed DependencyProperties are left behind.
Replacing datagrid with ListView resolves the issue.
See the attached sample project.
